column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Clyde S. Kilby]]'''.

column1: *'''Publication:''' Excerpts from the letter have been published in [[SEVEN 27|''SEVEN''
column2: Volume 27]] (p. 49). A shorter part of the letter was published in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide|The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]'' (p. 771).
